reviewText:
I just finished watching this new DVD of every childs favorite monkey Curious George.
The DVD has an episode about when George gets invited to be a guess in Kindergarten, there is another episode about a maze in Rankings Farm, Hundley teaching Sharky to behave so she can stay in her apartment complex and George of course has to come to the rescue, Professor Wiseman can't BAKE, so George seeks the help of Cheef Pasketi. It's a wonderful DVD that encourages children to use logic, seek help, try new things, use their imagination and invent new things! A must have DVD for any young child.

My kids both 3 right now love this pbs kids series, and I would encourage any parent to allow their children to watch Curious George.

Can you say anything bad about Curious George? It is one of the cutest, most wholesome programs out there for kids. My 3 year old son adores Curious George. He gets so many ideas for crafts, and games from watching George's adventures. I'm sure this new DVD due out this summer will be just as great as all the other DVD releases. We are collecting all of them as he grows. He's always asking to watch "a George".

I don't know that we hate this episode.  The one I received is blank.  I've never had that happen before.  My grandson is so fond of Curious George he was very disappointed when absolutely nothing showed up on that disk. The rest of them were perfect and he loves them so I am so glad I ordered more than the one.  He is 5 and doesn't understand why there is no movie on his new DVD.
My preschooler loves this dvd!
Curious george is a classic cartoon my grand daughter always watches it
It's a gift, have not seen it yet.all of them are good
My kids love this show!
George rocks!

My daughter loves curious george so I had to add this DVD to our collection.
Great movie and I would highly recommend.
my 2.5 year old twins love George!
Love and love and my kids love George. This dvd doesn't disappoint. It arrived faster than expected.
great
Bought this for a very sweet little girl. she love it and was happy to read it to her younger sister too..
Love that little monkey
Who doesn't like George! If you do get all the episodes you can.
Worked well, ans quick delivery, my son loved adding it to his collection.
All kids love curious George!

Our family loves the Curious George DVDs! We've been watching them since our son was a toddler and now he is six. We checked them out from the library so many times that it was well worth the price to purchase our own copies.

This DVD was packaged well, no damage or concerns.
my son is a big fan and it is perfect companion for when we travel.

Who doesn't like Curious George?

At my house he is a household favorite.

If you haven't heard of him, he is a monkey with the personality of a politician.  I would say his personality is somewhere between George W. Bush and Barack Obama.  Curious George is always doing silly things that don't make sense, but he always gets away with it.
GREAT
My son is a big fan.  The DVD was as expected.
Wonder product and experience.
Grand daughter sets and smile at George
My children enjoy the Curious George episodes.
My 4 year old has recently discovered Curious George. He LOVES this DVD of George going to school. Along with the other short episodes that can hold his attention.
Excellent.  My grandkids love it.

I have an 20 month grandson that will not sit still. But you pop in a Curious George DVD he will set down in the sequoia point at the DVD player and ride all day with out crying. THANK YOU Curious George.
My grandson loves all the Curious George movies and this one was no exception.
My granddaughter love this movie she is a curious George fan and she is only three.
My active 2 year old granddaughter won't sit still unless we put in a Curious George movie. She loves him!
My daughter can't get anough of Curious George!  It plays non stop when the t.v is on.  Great Price as well.
My grandson loves Curious George so I bought this for him. We like to watch it together. It is fun.
my kids love cutious goerge and any thing and everything about him . have most of the collection by now

"Back to School" is yet another George winner!

These stories from the PBS series are sure to make children - of all ages - smile.
They also make great Christmas and birthday gifts.
Be creative, have fun not only as on "Guest Monkey"  but also with shapes in Charkie goes to school.  It is a great educational tool.
Kids loves Curious George. he makes for kids fun and smile. kids enjoy learning  English very much. thank you George.
This DVD movie keeps my daughter busy when we are traveling long trips. She loves Curious George. Thanks a lot

I am so sick of the programming on Disney Channel teaching my boy that if you want to get down from a tree you need a giant piece of celery to slide down.  We try and give our child other things to do, but the reality is that sometimes it is just more appropriate to let him watch some TV...if you can stand the agenda of the people making the programs.

Then we ran across Curious George and were relieved.  No agendas, no politically correct subject matter, no illogical logic.  The first time we watched one it was like taking your shoes off after a long walk on a summer day...aaahhhh.

To top it off, each DVD only costs around $10. I ended up buying 10 different titles and have been happy with every one...thus I will copy and paste this review on each one of them.

This is one happy dad who loves that annoying monkey.
it's exciting to watch George figure out things that are happening in his every-day world, just like kids are wondering and investigating their world. I love PBS kids shows.
My 6 year old is a big fan of Curious George and was thrilled to recieved another of his dvd's. She often using these in long car rides to visit relatives. A mom cannot go wrong with Curious George!
My four year-old kids like Curious George. Even I can enjoy watching them. The contents are worth several times more than its actual price.
My son loves this. The video is square. On wide screen TVs, you will see a vertical black border on both the sides.
It is PBS episodes on DVD.  Curious George is great.  It is both of my kids favorite cartoon.  It is educational and suitable for any age.

My 2 year old loves watching Curious George on pbs while at home.  We must have several dozen episodes recorded.  Now when we go on road trips, we are able to watch Curious George thanks to the dvds.  They are the same episodes you watch on tv. Each DVD contains 8 shows totaling over 90 minutes of pure entertainment for our child to watch.
My daughter loves Curious George and we love this video!~  We have quite a collection and this is one of her favorites! We also bought a second one for my niece.
I liked the DVD and bought it for our library.  I did think that there were a lot of commericals before the actual program began, but I think children will enjoy it.

my nephew loves curius george. he watches him on tv almost everyday of the week. on this dvd, back to school, i'm trying to get him excited about going back to school and start preschool. i hope sometime this month, it happens sooner.

I was a little hesitant ordering this item because it was not new. I forget the exact description but it was from a company that sold used goods for charity. Despite my initial hesitation the product came through and worked as expected. The condition was exactly as described and worked fine in my Computer.

I would buy from this seller again.
My daughter is 2 and she loves this DVD. She always wants to watch it and it is the only DVD she will watch without getting up.
Another good item from the PBS arena.  Grand-daughter just loves to watch George and she learned how to read by watching him and paying attention to the background words.
Curious George never disappoints, and this DVD is no exception. Perfect for a little one starting preschool or kindergarten. The film includes several other stories as well.
EXCELLENT DVD!! Love that Monkey George!
bought for my grandson he is into curious George he loves all the shows
yes
Curious George is just the best! We are collecting all the DVD's because they just don't play on regular TV enough and we want clean cartoons.
Curious George has been popular in our house for over 12 years and spanning 3 kids. Always an A+ in our book!
My grandson loves it.
Grandson loves to watch Curious George!  Thank you for quick delivery
My little one thoroughly enjoys this movie! It arrived in great condition as well...,making mom happy.
My grandson loves curious George , he was excited as soon as he opened the box.. We had to watch right then.
George is so cute
